tgt_original: svadharmamupaniśritya vihāre tasya satkṛtau |  gurutve mānanāyāñca tatpūjā'

src_original: svabhāvasiddhalokanirodhajñānam,  lokasaṃjñānirodhajñānamiti ṣoḍaśa /  sarvatra vṛttimajjñānamadṛṣṭasya ca darśakam /
tgt_original: acintyaśāntatādarśi lokasaṃjñānirodhi ca |  jñānalakṣaṇamityuktaṃ sarvākārajñatānaye ||22 || iti

src_original: viśeṣalakṣaṇānāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre samyagupadarśitam / tathā hi -  acintyādiviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭaiḥ satyagocaraiḥ /  viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ṣaḍbhirdaśabhiścoditaṃ kṣaṇaiḥ //
tgt_original: abhisamayālaṅkārālokāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāvyākhyāyāṃ lokasandarśanaparivarto nāma dvādaśaḥ ||  sāmānyarūpatayā jñānākāreṇa paricchinnānāṃ viśeṣo jñeya iti |  jñānalakṣaṇānantaraṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyenopodvātayannāha |  atha khalvāyuṣmānityādi |
